website_summaries.verdict: These premium walkie-talkies are environmentally friendly and safe for kids of all ages.
pros: Deliver hi-fi acoustics for pristine sound quality and to protect kids' hearing
Allows kids to mute background noise
cons: Poor construction compared to similar walkie-talkies

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These pink walkie talkies are awesome. I have a 3 year old granddaughter and almost 2 year old granddaughter. They talk back and forth. It is simple to use as both can participate taking turns since being taught. They have done inside to outside, room to room and yes’s chair to chair. My oldest gave me one to use, Incase she needed me in the night! Lol. They love them! I love them! Simple to use, durable, they have been dropped, and comes through clearly!
customer_reviews.author: Hope❤️

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun. I bought them for my 3 year old and they are the perfect size for his little hands. They are also simple enough for him to figure out. They seem to reach pretty far and still have clear reception. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Terrell

customer_reviews.title: It's a mini walkie-talkie
customer_reviews.text: I give 2 Stars. The reason is I should have a better price margin for the buyer. The item does work as described. Not sure how well it works on distance. It does not come with batteries. Considering the price is high it should come with a rechargeable battery. We shouldn't have to buy batteries for this price should come included. Cute toy works well. Just not the quality I expected for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! If I could give zero stars I would. These walkie-talkies stopped working after one use. My daughter was too afraid to tell me that her birthday present stopped working. By the time I Asked where her walkie-talkies are the return window had closed! I am extremely disappointed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for granddaughters
customer_reviews.text: Apparently these are pretty great, they took them to their cabin over winter break and tested them out, don't know about battery life yet, though I included a giant package of batteries with their gift. The girls are enjoying them at home also. The ones they had before were really toys and had frozen characters on them . They like the turquoise camo on these. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute for my kids. They have a mini clip on the back so that you can attach them to your belt. Sound is very clear and has a long range. The kids enjoyed using it around the house. I just wished that they were rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy, sturdy and you have choices such as using rechargeable batteries or not, lanyard or not.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my little one. A friend had a pair so of course it’s all she’d talk about. Not knowing much about radios, these are better than I expected but I guess they’re great for the price. The sound is clear and they’re nice and sturdy. Other than constantly reminding my kid to press the button THEN talk, they’re super easy to use lol. Package says it goes up to 3 miles, it uses 3 AAA batteries, you can also choose to use rechargeable batteries and plug in to recharge. Your choice. They also come with lanyards that you clip the radios onto. All in all, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Medina

customer_reviews.title: ... help them to keep them occupied and playing together nicely the kids really love playing with these the range ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a couple sets of these for kids to play with and it literally keeps them occupied for hours I decided to get this for a friend of ours who has twins and I thought it would help them to keep them occupied and playing together nicely the kids really love playing with these the range is pretty good and not too static he and they make a good kid gift.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I son loves these! They are so easy to use and static free! I have bought him a few others that were nothing but static. Voice is very clear! This is a fun way for us to communicate whether it be outside or while he’s in his bedroom. It makes him feel like he has is own phone. They are smaller so it fits in his hand perfectly! Your kids will love these!
customer_reviews.author: tami l seelen

customer_reviews.title: These Walkie Talkies are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are so worth the money, well made, durable, work amazing and lots of fun to play with pre-school age grandson who loves to communicate from across the house with us on them. We purchased a different set before this one and they were basically junk but this set is so worth buying. He has been playing with them for about a year several times a week and they are still like new!
customer_reviews.author: Prepper

customer_reviews.title: Low battery life
customer_reviews.text: The batteries don’t seem to last very long. Both my girls used the walki talkies with brand new batteries and it died the following day. I even made sure to turn both of them off before bed time. Also, don’t let the packaging discourage you, it seemed super small at first and I even mAde myself believe that I was missing one. The walkies are just perfect toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrijana Mihajlovic

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Good sound and range. Love the lanyard
customer_reviews.text: These are my second set of walkie talkies for my kids. I loved the first set but decided to take a chance in these. I LOVE that they only take 3 batteries vs 4. I love the lanyard that comes with it. They feel heavy duty and so excited bc I found out that as long as we have wallows on sale channel we can still use them with the one from our previous set. The sound quality is great as well as range. Very happy’
customer_reviews.author: Jenlinjos

customer_reviews.title: Cute walkie talkie
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son who is a NCIS fan. He really enjoys this walkie talkie and pretends he is working in the field. The box contains 2 walkie talkie, 2 lanyard and a user manual. It requires 3 AAA batteries. Ours did not come with recharge cable but I can see a recharge port. There are multiple channels and 10 ring tones available. It's a great toy, we even use for communication in the house:) my 8 yr old son finds it amusing.
customer_reviews.author: Daya

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nieces birthday. She loves to hunt bugs and I got her these to go with a set. They look just as pictured and are super easy to use! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara LeeAnn Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great for parents
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my child and myself especially when she goes outside to play at our nearby park. I can keep track of her at all times. They don't come with a rechargeable battery but can take regular AAA batteries or rechargeable ones that you use a USB charger on. Not bad for the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Vey cute toy set for kids. I purchased as a gift for a 10 year old. He loved it and was very excited. I really like the design and doesn’t look too much like a “baby toy”. Many other wallow talkie sets have cartoon characters so it was difficult finding some appropriate for his age group. The package arrived fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: arlena moran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for kids.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 pairs. These are excellent gifts for kids to use for outside play/ hiking or camping. They are small for little hands so it can be easy for 3 year old age to use. Also it has a clip to hang on the belt . It can easily fit in a pocket as well. The voice comes across very clear. I like it that it only uses 3 AAA batteries instead of 4 and it has a little tiny light available to use as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Stops recharging, just a cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: After the first full charge and useage, they never charged again. Didn't drop it, damage any parts of it or the charging cable, or anything... it just stopped being able to recharge. We we're lucky the walkie talkies came with the option to insert batteries as well, but it's still ridiculous that it just doesn't charge anymore. Other than that, the walkie talkies themselves work as expected. They feel light and cheap which is expected since they're just toys, but they get the job done. It's a shame that they're listed at this price though. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Chow

customer_reviews.title: Real walkie talkies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid but these are real ones and not a toy. I was really surprised with the quality of the voice. They are super clear and the range is really long.. I was able to communicate even with a distance if more than a mile.. this can even be used for hiking.. I really love this! Eats up the battery pretty quickly. It can be improved
customer_reviews.author: Arunkumar Murugesan

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it can take some damage
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my other set of cheap walkie talkies. I hate when my kids yell from across the other side of the house. These are perfect. Small, easy to use and the audio quality is not supreme but good enough for what we need. Looks like they can take some damage and with kids that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. The color combo is really nice and perfect for a boy! The sound quality is great and there are tons of channels. My only complaint is that I wish the talk button was bigger and easier to press for kids - I have no problem with it, but it's a little hard for my son to talk while keeping the button continually pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hohler

customer_reviews.title: Fun once the settings are right.
customer_reviews.text: These are a little hard for younger children who like to push button, they change the settings. My children did have fun with these keeping up with each other on their power wheels. Strong sound volume. They do not come with rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: underwds

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow these work so good for being so small and light. I was in my home while my fiancé ran down the road about a mile away and the sound was still super clear I couldn’t even hear the wind or rain.. yes he ran outside in the rain lol. Got for my daughter (7yrs) and her best friend that lives down the road from us so they can talk when ever they want for Xmas. Waaaaay better than the cheaply made WM ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie velo

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace a set of previous Walkie Talkies for my daughter. The cost saving alone on having not to purchase batteries is so worth it. These are very nice because they are rechargeable. The battery seems to last nearly 3.5 days even with moderate use of a toddler. I do think they are a little smaller in size compared to others but not a deal breaker. The range is decent for kids walkie talkies. Only thing I would change is color options, I would like to see more color choices. I would recommend for kids over the age of 3. Such a fun toy for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to know what my daughter was doing when she was playing with the neighbor, at their house, but she is too young for a phone. This is perfect, it is easy for both of us to use and has clear sound!
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kiddos great color stands out forsure 😀
customer_reviews.text: Great little walkies my niece loves them and now both her & my other niece can talk to one another when in different rooms they absolutely love them 😉. My only draw back is there are plenty of walkies on here that offer rechargeable batteries included which is a better deal. Overall great product definitely can't loose due to color lol.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Fun and High Tech!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! We bought this for my daughter's 5th birthday and our kids don't out them down! They are so easy to use but have so many high tech features and the best... a rechargeable battery! I love this product when my daughters are riding their bikes or playing in the neighborhood. They have an excellent range. I would highly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: MCL14

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, does not charge as listed. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this because it has a recharge feature, which would be cheaper than buying batteries whenever it dies. It did not come with any recharging batteries and they are not built into the devices. There is an open slot to insert your own batteries. Had this been communicated in the listing, I would have never purchased it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Mays

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof. Would like longer batt life
customer_reviews.text: Kid proof so far, but the battery life could be a little better. I'm s not terrible just needs a little improvement. I am not a super non-critical reviewer I look for functional but over all kids like them and that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: christophertaylor

customer_reviews.title: Reliving my childhood
customer_reviews.text: These have been such a hit in my house. Both kids and adults love them! The reception and sound clarity are fantastic! I really like how compact they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well these kid walkie talkies work. I was able to walk around my neighborhood and still be able to talk to people in my house. Well worth the money! The sound quality is great and they are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the size of these walkie talkies. They look like they should be used by a toddler and not a 10 year old. I’ll have to purchase an additional gift because I feel so bad giving these to a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Does not recharge
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas and they worked until the batteries died, we replaced batteries and even tried charging them with a charging cord and neither one will turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: They work well my boyfriend and I bought them to use while he’s in the shop and I’m in the house....yes we have phones he just doesn’t use his. They work well the packaging was smaller than I expected but the product itself loos great. They have a good sound quality for a kids toy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Duschl

customer_reviews.title: Crappy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with batteries or charger! I do not recommend these for no body or no kids. My kids were really let down by these. Hopefully the next ones I get will work and come with the charger and batteries uf they are rechargeable walkie talkues!!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelyn Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great. My three year old can use easily. We love taking them to the park and playing games on them. There is a lanyard so he can wear and not have to hold.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: good walkie talkie
customer_reviews.text: My kids had a lot of fun with this walkie talkie. IT's easy to use they could figure out how to use it without my instruction. The connection seems very good around the house and in 1 miles radius. But the battery seems to drain fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got these walkie talkies for my son for his 9th birthday. He loves them, especially the camo designs. They work great and are easy to use. They are smaller than I expected and the box states they’re for ages 3+, my 9 year old doesn’t seem to mind though. So.... read all the details if you want walkie talkies that are bigger!
customer_reviews.author: MegR

customer_reviews.title: Communication is key
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter lives 6 houses down from us. I got these so she can talk whenever she wants and not have to use her moms phone.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great range, fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for vacation for our three year old to play (with us). She loved them! Easy enough for her to figure out how to use, nice size for her little hands, and a great range! And you can’t beat the price. They have seemed to really blow through batteries but I think it’s our fault - accidentally leaving them on. Sometimes we even talk with them when she’s in the third row of the car, just for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for my 6yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Great walkies for my girl to play down the street with her friends. She is 6, & she can use them easily. However with regular batteries, they die very quickly. It'll say 2 bars left on batteries & it'll die every time you use it. So we replace almoatvevery 2 weeks now. They do come with a cord to charge rechargeable batteries, however everytime we go to buy the size, there isnt any in the store. So not sure how that feature works! Which is why I give it 4stars!
customer_reviews.author: carrie a

customer_reviews.title: 4 yr old niece loves!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for niece (4 years) she LOVES them. I didn’t realize they do not come with batteries- that’s a separate purchase you need to make. But she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product!
customer_reviews.text: Could not get them to work... the buttons are very small for even my 4yr old granddaughters hands. These things just didn't work & we tried everything!
customer_reviews.author: ChocolateDoll323

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: How do you entertain a four year old for hours?.....buy them these as a gift! This fast became the favorite Christmas gift and guess what....they are still playing with them! Win! Win! Very durable too. Trust me, they have been well tested in that department.
customer_reviews.author: GracysMom

customer_reviews.title: Walkie Talkies very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact they are small for little hands.... also the clarity was a lot better than I anticipated. Love them. I got these for my 6 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get blue like I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are misleading.... I selected “boy” and saw blue. I received green. Not a huge deal but I wanted a different color for my children then the set grandparents have.
customer_reviews.author: piper

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t work at all so I’m sending them back
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We only just started using these from Christmas but they are so perfect for our 6 year old! They are perfect size and good sound. The pattern is fun and I think he's going to love using them outside in the summer. Recommend for 5-8 year olds
customer_reviews.author: S.Hanne

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: I have three of them. This gives me a sense of security because I can constantly check on my kids when they are out playing.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They work well and the kids love them. They love playing with the flashlight as well. It comes with strings that make them easier to hold so that is a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: They come with USB charger but that's only useful if you used rechargeable batteries. So make sure to get those!! The sound is good enough and the volume is easy to set. They are super small but perfect for kid's hands.
customer_reviews.author: Alduce

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for young kids to get them off the tablets.
customer_reviews.text: The kids had a blast with this. They use it all day the battery only lasted a day and a half two at most. We use the Duracell Good batteries not the cheap kind. The sound quality the usability it works great.
customer_reviews.author: caleb v.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids to pretend play
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this! They love pretending to be detectives and can talk to each other all day long. It’s Sturdy and has a clip which they can use on their clothes. It has a very loud range volume but can be adjusted. It also works all throughout the house which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sufian Bhatti

customer_reviews.title: Great walkie talkies
customer_reviews.text: These were for my grandson who is 4. He loved them once he was taught how to push the button and how to say "Over" after his was done talking. Took a little practice, but will worth it. He is a pro now.
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The 2 1/2 year old hasn't figured out to hold down the button to speak yet but the 3 year old loves to talk into it with his parents! Perfect size for tiny hands!
customer_reviews.author: Amarilis Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great for small children
customer_reviews.text: These walkie Talkies are great for small children. They are small and easy to carry and they also come with a lanyard so they can use them while playing. They do not make a loud sound when they get to close to each other and the range on them has been awesome. We have been close to a mile apart and could still hear perfectly clear. They have also been dropped several times by little toddler hands and still work great.
customer_reviews.author: KTB

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Christmas gift for a grandchild. It will remain unopened until then. I will update my review after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.  Granddaughter loves to use it when we go for walks.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. The walkie talkies work very well within a mile distance, but haven't tested from any longer yet. Fun for kids and adults to use with them.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D

customer_reviews.title: Uhhh cute?
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny and fair warning you have to purchase rechargeable AAA batteries for it to be rechargeable. . .
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These were cute but too small. Way smaller than expected. Thought price was too much for the quality of it. These should have been half the price paid. I bought these for my niece as a present and I ended up having to buy her something else to go with it because I was embarrassed to give them to her alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These work great. My daughter loves them. The battery holds a great charge, they have more than enough range for kids, the audio comes through very clear and it’s great that they have lanyards so they’re not being dropped constantly. I would recommend. So would my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great size, rechargeable & camouflage. Happy kid.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact they come with a charger, they fit perfectly in smaller hands & great for little pockets.
customer_reviews.author: aacaboo

customer_reviews.title: kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and his buddy live playing with the walkie talkies. They enjoyed the fact that they could talk to each other while in separate rooms
customer_reviews.author: windy chavis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My kids love them. We used them in the neighborhood and when camping!
customer_reviews.author: Alison E Stremlau

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter to take camping. She has so much fun with them. They really work great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not really rechargeable!
customer_reviews.text: These are a joke...rechargeable? You have to buy your own rechargeable batteries and then you an recharge them?! The walkie talkies we’re cheaply made and the battery compartment broke the first time we put batteries in. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for young kids. My daughter loved them. Great range and clarity for kids product. Could talk to daughter while out with dog a block away. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that these were chargeable. I gave them to my son and his friend for Christmas but they couldn’t use them because they needed batteries. After getting batteries, only one worked.
customer_reviews.author: starkyjr

customer_reviews.title: First month good, not sure about the future
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these and have used them for the last month a lot! But now they are having problems shutting off unexpectedly. Work well. Can hear well. But am suspect on their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Sound quality is really good and there durable as well
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kids. They have a blast being able to talk to each other when one is upstairs and the other downstairs! Easy for my 3 year old!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Walkie talkie
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old nephew really enjoys using it with me.
customer_reviews.author: Juice Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this walkie for my son in his birthday, it was a great birthday present, the sound quality is very good, it is lightweight, and has spot light as well.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Kabbani

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a large age range
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nieces and nephews, 4 year twin boys and 8 and 9 year old girls. They all loved them, including my 3 year old. He struggled with pushing the button at the appropriate time, but he gets how to turn on the little light and he can carry it around easily and "use" it. Definitely a good investment for all of the cousins.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Loved by 6 years old and his companies
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son’s playground adventure with his friends/cousins. It’s easy to set up and doesn’t drain the battery fast. I love the add on flash light
customer_reviews.author: Puteri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift, perfect size for little hands, and “pink, not some boy color”
customer_reviews.author: B Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are obsessed with these and use them all the time. They drop them often and they're still going strong. Colors and bright and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: AZLove

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Grandson. He had a blast with them. They worked well in our two story home and in the basement to the upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Horgan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved these and I loved watching them play. Easy to use small enough for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My children love it. It gives them an opportunity to go into a world of imagination and creativity. The devices are durable and work well. They are toys and don’t have super distance communication but gets the job done. Would have been good to know that the devices are quite small. But for kids it’s perfectly fine. My 6 year old really enjoys it...
customer_reviews.author: Rowan Govender

customer_reviews.title: So Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: These walkie talkies were okay but I go them for a 7 year old and they were so tiny in his hands. They were okay but not thrilled with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I kind of wish we would spent a couple extra bucks for a better set.
customer_reviews.text: These say chargeable but they aren't really. I wish we would have bought different ones for a few bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: JChapman86

customer_reviews.title: great for camping
customer_reviews.text: great when we are camping and we all go in different rzrs
customer_reviews.author: Starla Perry

customer_reviews.title: Work well and fine
customer_reviews.text: There are a few confuse when the kids first using it, but once they get the hang of it, they work really, really well.The walkie talkies also have a great range and the sound is clear.I am able to talk to my kids that are across the street while I'm inside the house and still have very clear signal.Very satisfied with this buying. highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Griselda V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son absolutely loved these. Small enough for his little hands and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Great for kiddos.
customer_reviews.text: Buy rechargeable batteries, but otherwise my kids love these. They are clear sounding and easy to use and fit easily in little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Easy accessible to children
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality easy for children to use and awesome mile reach
customer_reviews.author: alexis slawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great for kids. They were a bit smaller than I expected but functionally perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kou Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very small and since they use AAA batteries, the batteries don't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: CEK

customer_reviews.title: Great size for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 6 year old children received these for Christmas and they love them. They’re small, so little hands can easily hold them and utilize the buttons with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Orgill

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for kids. Seems very well built and range seems really good!
customer_reviews.author: Product King

customer_reviews.title: I don’t have anything to say
customer_reviews.text: They are a little hard to use for a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Great Walkies for kids...it doesn’t reach 3 miles though! Not even 1!
customer_reviews.text: Cute for little kids! Like the flashlight and the size ... they are on the smaller side . It states it works within 3 miles... that’s definitely a big NONO . Measured it ... it stopped working at .3 miles! 🤔😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of the buttons stoped working shortly after I purchased. Seller wouldn’t replace. But the new ones seem fine
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: These are shockingly well made!! I’m so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: No bateries included.
customer_reviews.text: When the term "rechargeable" is used, it's assumed batteries are included. I needed to buy a set of rechargeable AAA batteries that were more expensive then the product and more then doubled my overall cost.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my children and we love using these all the time!
customer_reviews.author: smc2109

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good range and decent battery life BUT the auto detect feature for speaking only worked half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Much better!
customer_reviews.text: The back falls off really easily.. had to put it up til my kids are older Update 11/2018: They sent new ones and theyre awesome. Customer service is top notch!! I've reccomended them to all my friends !
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Qualuty product
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be easy to use and the sound was clear.
customer_reviews.author: Marylyn

product_meta.title: E-WOR Walkie Talkies for Kids Rechargeable, 4 Miles Range 22 Channels 2 Way Radios with Flashlight and LCD Screen, 2019 Best Kids walkie talkies for Boys and Girls, Toys for 3-12 Year Old Kids
feature_bullets: 【 RECHARGEABLE WALKIE TALKIES 】- Unique rechargeable function, which means you don't often have to change batteries, charging directly with USB interface makes it convenient. （batteries and charging cables are not included）

【 BEST TOYS GIFTS 】- Best Gifts Toys for boys and girls, our walkie talkies is the best choice to hide and seek, bear hunts, camping, road trip, travel, exploring, hunting, adventures, hiking, educational learning, backyard activities or any indoor or outdoor activities they want. Be the hero in any story that they make up.

【 HANDS FREE FEATURE 】- E-WOR Kids walkie talkie support voice activation（VOX）talking - relax kids hands, send your voice without pressing any button. Great for playing games, hiking, travel and other different activities.

【 DESIGN FOR KIDS 】- An uncomplicated push-to-talk button makes this toy easy to use, labeled buttons, backlit LED screens and flashlight make these two way radio walkie talkies for kids fun and easy, day or night.If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase or you child didn't like, let us know and we will give you a full refund, no questions asked!

【 HIGH DEFINITION SOUND 】- HIFI acoustical quality, powerful antenna ensure the walkie talkies with stable signal and the auto squelch function will mute the background noise so you get the crisp sound even in crowded places.
